title: Return to Earth
goal: Reactivate the escape shuttle and leave the derelict space station

rooms.name: Cryosleep Chamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit chamber filled with frosted cryopods. Emergency lights flicker red. A large viewing window reveals the endless stars outside.

items.name: your cryopod
items.description: The cryopod you just awoke from, still covered in frost.

items.name: crew locker
items.description: A metal locker bolted to the wall. A digital panel blinks beside the lock.

items.name: control console
items.description: A small console with various switches. A locked drawer is built into its side.

items.name: scientist's log
items.description: A small datapad containing a personal log file.
items.text: Systems failing… Commander Vega entrusted maintenance to Engineer Pierson. He always said to remember his favorite number: 3.14.

items.name: commander's message
items.description: A sealed envelope with the Commander's insignia.
items.text: Crew member, remember who you are. You are Pilot Tiernan of Earth Fleet. You alone can launch the escape shuttle. — Commander Vega

items.name: airlock door
items.description: A sealed door with warning labels. It leads deeper into the station.

rooms.name: Central Corridor
rooms.description: A long metallic hallway illuminated by flickering overhead panels. The walls are lined with digital portraits of past crew members.

items.name: portrait of Engineer Pierson
items.description: A holographic portrait of a smiling engineer.
items.text: Engineer Pierson — Chief Engineer. Responsible for repair, maintenance, and power systems.

items.name: portrait of Cadet Juno
items.description: A hologram of a young space cadet.
items.text: Cadet Juno — Communications Trainee. Lost her family during the Europa outpost collapse.

items.name: portrait of Commander Vega
items.description: A proud commander in full uniform.
items.text: Commander Vega — Leader of Earth Fleet Station One. Known for bravery and devotion to crew.

items.name: escape shuttle hatch
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the escape shuttle bay. A terminal beside it displays three questions.

password_questions.question: Who maintained the station's power systems?
Where did Cadet Juno's family perish?
Who are you?
password_questions.hint: Perhaps someone left you a message.

rooms.name: Escape Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: A brightly lit hangar housing a small escape shuttle. Its engines hum softly, awaiting launch commands.

items.name: escape shuttle
items.description: A compact spacecraft ready for departure back to Earth.

rooms.win_message: You board the escape shuttle and initiate launch. The engines roar to life as the derelict station fades behind you. You are heading home. You win!
